pr_title: Add option to control join filter rewrites

timeline.message: Add option to control join filter rewrites

timeline.bodyText: Does this need to be added to the docs?
timeline.author: ccaominh

replies.bodyText: It should, I'll do a follow on PR that adds docs for enableJoinFilterPushDown as well
replies.author: jon-wei

timeline.bodyText: Wrong key name (unused new rewrite key name getting flagged by intellij inspection job)
timeline.author: ccaominh

timeline.bodyText: Javadoc reference to this method on line 54 needs to be updated (flagged by intellij inspection job)
timeline.author: ccaominh
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -88,7 +88,8 @@ public static JoinFilterSplit splitFilter(
       HashJoinSegmentStorageAdapter hashJoinSegmentStorageAdapter,
       Set<String> baseColumnNames,
       @Nullable Filter originalFilter,
-      boolean enableFilterPushDown
+      boolean enableFilterPushDown,
+      boolean enableFilterRewrite
